aka: Nuclear Power Plant Krsko Catastrophe Survival Manual
Video prirucnik za slucaj nuklearne katastrofe u Krskom
this_title: Video priručnik za slučaj nuklearne katastrofe u Krškom
trans_title: Nuclear Power Plant Krsko Catastrophe Survival Manual
Video prirucnik za slucaj nuklearne katastrofe u Krskom
introduction: A wise-ass Croat reporter goes to Krsko, the site of the only nuclear plant built in Former Yugoslavia. It turns out that her reprting trip coincides with the plant disaster that has apocalyptic consequences.This film club production was made by Suncica Ana Veldic, Olja Budimir and Lovro Cepelak. It was shot on location in Krsko.
chinese_title: Video priručnik za slučaj nuklearne katastrofe u Krškom
